knimeNode.name: Pitest Adapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Pitest Metric Adapter, ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to read data from Pitest entries file.
PIT is a state of the art mutation testing system, providing gold standard test coverage for Java and the jvm. Its fast, scalable and integrates with modern test and build tooling. Running Pitest - refer to http://pitest.org/. In Maven you can run it using: mvn org.pitest:pitest-maven:mutationCoverage
Remember about choosing xml as result file format.
Please check workflow examples here. Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the pitest entries file
